tuv.seg: Unlawful arrest and detention
Gabháil agus coinneáil neamhdhleathach
In order to arrest you, the Garda Siochana must have a warrant for your arrest unless you are arrested for an offence that is punishable by imprisonment for a term of 5 years or more
Más mian leis an nGarda Síochana tú a ghabháil ní mór barántas gafa a bheith acu ach amháin sa chás go bhfuil tú gafa as coir lena mbaineann téarma príosúnachta de 5 bliana nó níos mó léi
In that case, the Gardai must have reasonable cause to suspect that you are guilty of an offence
Sa chás sin ní mór go mbeadh cúis réasúnta ag na Gardaí le bheith in amhras gur tusa atá ciontach as coir
Once you are arrested, you must be brought to a Garda station without undue delay and informed that you have a right to consult a solicitor. See our document on treatment in custody
Nuair atá tú gafa ní mór tú a thabhairt chuig stáisiún Garda gan aon mhoill mhíchuí agus chuir in iúl go bhfuil sé de cheart dul i gcomhairle le haturnae tú
You must be told the reason for your arrest. The Gardaí do not have to inform you in any particular form the reason and legal basis for your arrest
Ní mór a chur in iúl duit cén fáth a bhfuil tú gafa - ní mór don Gharda a ghabh thú a insint duit go díreach cén choir lena bhfuil tú gafa
For example, if you are arrested for drink driving the Garda is not obliged to cite the specific provision ("I am arresting you under the provisions of Section 49 (8) of the Road Traffic Act, 1961")
Muna bhfuil sa ghabháil ach cur i gcéill ar mhaithe le tú a cheistiú maidir le coireanna eile is gabháil neamhdhleathach atá inti
Your arrest is unlawful if the Garda fails to inform you in ordinary language the reason for your arrest or fails to cite the relevant law
Nuair atá tú gafa, tá sé de cheart agat a bheith tugtha ós comhair na cúirte chomh luath agus is féidir
If your arrest is just a sham or a cover so that you can be questioned in relation to other offences, then that arrest is unlawful
Tá sé leagtha síos i reachtaíocht éagsúil cé chomh fada gur féidir thú a choinneáil le ceistiú
However, if the reasons for your arrest are given to you at any time during your detention, your custody becomes lawful from that point on
Sa chuid is mó cásanna nuair atá duine gafa as coir lena mbaineann príosúnacht 5 bliana nó níos mó, ní féidir é/í a choinneáil ach ar feadh 12 uair
When you are arrested, you have a right to be brought before a court at the first possible opportunity
Cé go bhfuil tú faoi choinneáil, tá ceart bunreachtúil rochtain réasúnach dlíodóir agat
Different legislation specifies how long you may be held in detention for questioning
Tá ceart agat chun a insint gur féidir leat dul i gcomhairle le haturnae
If you ask for a solicitor you cannot be questioned until they arrive, except in exceptional circumstances
Má iarrann tú le haghaidh aturnae nach féidir leat a cheistiú go dtí go sroicheann siad
You have a right to have your solicitor in the room with you while you are being interviewed
Tá sé de cheart go mbeadh do aturnae sa seomra agallaimh
If you have been unlawfully arrested, evidence obtained as a result of that arrest will be inadmissible
Má dhéantar tú a ghabháil go neamhdhleathach ní bheidh aon fhianaise a bhailítear dá bharr ceadaithe
For example, if you were mistakenly told by a Garda that you were being arrested under the wrong section of the Road Traffic Act, the arrest and the blood sample taken would be unlawful

Mar shampla, má dhéanann Garda botún agus má insíonn sé/sí duit go bhfuil tú dhá ghabháil faoin gcuid mícheart den Acht um Thrácht Bhóthair, bheadh an ghabháil agus an sampla fola a tógadh neamhdhleathach
The blood sample would not be admissible as evidence
Ní bheadh an sampla fola ceadaithe mar fhianaise
Evidence obtained while you are unlawfully detained has also been unlawfully obtained and will be inadmissible
Aon fhianaise a fritheadh nuair a bhí tú coinnithe go neamhdhleathach fritheadh í go neamhdhleathach freisin agus ní bheidh sí ceadaithe
For example, if you have been in custody for longer than the maximum period allowed and you make a confession, that confession will not be admissible in evidence against you
Mar shampla, má bhí tú coinnithe ar feadh achair níos faide ná an uasthréimhse atá ceadaithe agus má admhaíonn tú don choir, ní bheidh an admháil sin ceadaithe mar fhianaise i do choinne
Evidence obtained in breach of your right to reasonable access to a lawyer is also inadmissible as evidence against you
Níl aon fhianaise a fhaightear a sharaíonn an ceart atá agat teacht ar dhlíodóir ceadaithe mar fhianaise i do choinne freisin
For example, if you request a lawyer and your request is refused, any statements you make to the police will be inadmissible as evidence against you
Mar shampla, má iarrann tú labhairt le dlíodóir agus má dhiúltaítear don éileamh sin, d'fhéadfadh aon ráitis a dhéanann tú do na Gardaí a bheith neamhcheadaithe mar fhianaise i do choinne
